about_the_game:
Prepare your survival bottle and immerse yourself in a world where your goal is to survive. In order to do so, you must gather resources, battle animals, craft items, and build yourself a shelter. Can you survive?

Features

  • preparing survival bottle
  • crafting
  • building
  • fighting
  • fishing

Wishlist the game to support the development!
detailed_description:
Prepare your survival bottle and immerse yourself in a world where your goal is to survive. In order to do so, you must gather resources, battle animals, craft items, and build yourself a shelter. Can you survive?

Features

  • preparing survival bottle
  • crafting
  • building
  • fighting
  • fishing

Wishlist the game to support the development!
name: Wild

  • OS: kein Toaster
  • Processor: kein Toaster
  • Memory: 69 MB RAM
  • Graphics: kein Toaster
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 69 MB available space

  • VR Support: kein Toaster

short_description: Wild is a survival game inspired by the "7vsWild" series. The goal is to survive, fight against dangerous animals, and build your shelter. For that, you are only allowed to take one bottle as equipment, so prepare it well in advance.
